title: Noob things even pros do sometimes
body:
1. When caught in the middle of {{champion:21}} 's ult, walks toward or directly away from her with no chance of damaging her. 
2. When {{champion:223}}  is ready to eat an enemy but an ally steps in front of him.
3. When people accidentally walk into global projectiles (e.g. {{champion:22}} 's enchanted arrow, {{champion:222}} rockets).
4. When two people on the same team put their wards in the same place at the same time.
5. Fight {{champion:1}}.

Help me expand this list, fellow LoLLers!

replies.body:
I'm not pro by a long shot, but today in a particularly exciting Poro King match I accidentally bought two pairs of boots. Almost got away with it the next time I died, but JUST THEN enemy team member says in /all: HEY AHRI Y DOUBLE BOOTS LOOOOOOL!!!

(´๑•_•๑)
What's wrong with double boots though?

stack dat magic pen
{{item:3020}} {{item:3020}}

{{champion:106}} : obviously he needs 4 boots.

{{champion:113}} : beast obviously needs 4, she needs 2.

It sucks because you cant even build anything but boots on Sej. :( Buff boots plz rito!
{{champion:60}} full boots build confirmed.

> [{quoted}](name=7Artemis7,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=RQaE9ArU,comment-id=0000000100000000,timestamp=2016-01-06T08:21:48.997+0000)

You cant even buy enough for her cuz we only have 6 item slots... RITO PLZ!!!!

2 feet of what?? ;D

But srsly, I said two pairs! That's four individual bootsies!!

That's just wrong. Please don't be an incorrect grammar nazi. Also, just to be clear you are correct that you CAN use pair as the plural, but you can also use pairs, so don't correct other people who are Englishing just fine.
{{champion:103}} Every girl needs a couple pair of boots.

Oh man. Last night, Riot ThEntropist and I were playing a duo game. I was Tahm and he was Lee. I had 3 stacks on the enemy Morg and he has his Q on her. He Q'd in, I flashed in, and I ate him instead. Woops.

RIP Promos

Also, every time I mess up a wall on Anivia and wall my teammates in/out

http://imgur.com/7zOB3oi
Trying to 1v1 a {{champion:13}}  when you're not fed.
Trying to 1v1 a {{champion:13}} *

Not let supports use up their {{item:3401}} stacks after laning phase.
The support obviously trying to get canon minion low enough to execute, ally scumbag Lulu pops in and machine-guns the whole wave, then walks off leaving the support with jack-shit. Even saw it several times at Worlds this year.

1v1ing a post 6 {{champion:90}} 

This is from my experience. Someone tried to 1v1 me and I was Malzahar... I think you know how that went. Its hilarious how much 1v1 strength he has post 6.

Oh god I'll never forget the time I was going against a Nidalee midlane as malzahar and I had full health and combo and she had about 3/4 of her hp, I let her hit me with a spear because I knew she'd go in on me and she did just that, then I completely facerolled her the second she got in range, t'was hilarious
The full Malzahar combo NEVER gets old! EVER! [Shift Al Mani!](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=EMdww9QW2aQ)
TAKING THE GODDAMN SNOWBALL JUST BECAUSE YOU FUCKING HIT SOMEONE WITH IT
lee syndrome

{{item:3340}} Missing the bush

Stay to bait with next to no HP and then get killed by a random AoE effect. Seriously, I really fail to understand those baits when you have 100HP left. At that point, a high five will kill you. Just go back.
a squishy trying to 1vs1 a low health {{champion:105}}

Even the best junglers miss smite from time to time
saint pls

Buying boots on {{champion:42}}...

He has a fucking helicopter he doesn't need boots.

Also {{champion:267}} {{champion:34}} {{champion:69}} and {{champion:134}} who all float/fly in some way.

Miss {{champion:412}} {{champion:53}} {{champion:111}} Hook

Number one has to be fail flashing.

Everyone face plants.

Every.

One.

I think improper use if Bard's ult should top of rhe list.

I'm occasionally guilty of failing to flash walls.

For the pros, I want to see what happens when Poppy's new hammer enters the fray in LCS.
Well, I tend to sometimes blow my ult trying to use my trinket to ward bushes. So I wonder why I hear a loud CLANG and before I know it I'm in the enemy team's base...

Set your trinket to 4. 
Most of the time, you won't have 4 active items anyway, so it's a waste to leave it set to 7.
My trinket is set on 4. Which is right anove R.
unless they changed default keybindings trinkets have been set to 4 which is probably why he is having issues.
Better yet, set it to your middle mouse button.
THAT'S A BUTTON?
